metadata.title: CVE-2019-10092 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: In Apache HTTP Server 2.4.0-2.4.39, a limited cross-site scripting issuewas reported affecting the mod_proxy error page. An attacker could causethe link on the error page to be malformed and instead point to a page oftheir choice. This would only be exploitable where a server was set up withproxying enabled but was misconfigured in such a way that the Proxy Errorpage was displayed.

criterions.comment: apache2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
